Name Rascal/Libraries/Vis/Figure/Figures/overlay

Function Figure overlay(Figures figs, FProperty props...)
Description Composition of a list of figures by overlaying them on top of each other. Figure are aligned according to their anchor point.
Examples /* b1 = box(size(80,50), fillColor("Red")); b2 = box(size(50,30), fillColor("Blue")); b3 = box(size(20,50), fillColor("Yellow")); render(overlay([b1, b2, b3]));
  • / gives:

    /* b1 = box(size(80,50), top(), right(), fillColor("Red")); b2 = box(size(50,30), fillColor("Blue")); b3 = box(size(20,50), fillColor("Yellow")); render(overlay([b1, b2, b3]));
  • / gives:

    /* b1 = box(size(80,50), bottom(), left(), fillColor("Red")); b2 = box(size(50,30), fillColor("Blue")); b3 = box(size(20,50), fillColor("Yellow")); render(overlay([b1, b2, b3]));
  • / gives:

    /* b1 = box(size(80,50), bottom(), left(), fillColor("Red")); b2 = box(size(50,30), fillColor("Blue")); b3 = box(size(20,50), right(), fillColor("Yellow")); render(overlay([b1, b2, b3]));
  • / gives:

    /* b1 = box(size(80,50), bottom(), left(), fillColor("Red")); b2 = box(size(50,30), top(), fillColor("Blue")); b3 = box(size(20,50), right(), fillColor("Yellow")); render(overlay([b1, b2, b3]));
  • / gives:
